title: Help! Item Shop is too big since I updated my alpha client to beta client!
body: Its the size of my screen and I don't know how to fix it. I searched everywhere and none of the solutions are working!

replies.body: I also need help with this. Theres only one window size in the settings and it's too big.

I'm assuming this is the in-game shop and not the store.  You might be using a 4K which is not currently supported, some settings may have messed up. You may need to reduce the resolution of your screen and monitor to fix this up.   If you have Windows, you may also need to adjust your DPI scaling to fix this up:

Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

That should get the image issues fixed up!
